enter_min_dot.description: Min dot against an obstacle required to enter cover

exit_max_dot.description: Max dot against an obstacle required to exit cover

min_height.description: Min height of an obstacle to take cover against it

max_distance.description: Maximum distance to an obstacle to enter cover (length of rays)

num_angles.description: Number of raycast angles around the character

spread_angle.description: Number of degrees of rays in front of the character

wanted_distance.description: Avatar will automatically push towards cover until reaching this distance

wanted_distance_height_min.description: Min height at which distance check is performed

wanted_distance_height_max.description: Max height at which distance check is performed

wanted_distance_num_rays.description: Num rays to determine cover distance

height_num_raycasts.description: Num rays to determine height of an obstacle

height_ray_origin_z_offset.description: How high up the rays originate from

height_max_forward_offset.description: Height raycast will be cast from character plus this offset

height_animation_min_height.description: Cover height lower than or equal to this will give minimum (0) cover height animation value

height_animation_max_height.description: Cover height higher than or equal to this will give maximum (1) cover height animation value

height_animation_lerp_speed.description: Lerp speed of height animation variable

aim_over_max_height.description: Max height of cover to still be able to shoot above it

aim_side_ray_origin_offset.description: Distance from avatar which the side aim ray originates from

aim_side_min_line_of_sight.description: Min line of side required to be allowed to side aim (ray length)

crouch_auto_toggle_animation_height.description: If cover height animation value gets lower than this, the character will be considered crouching

crouch_auto_toggle_required_cover_time.description: Need to stay in cover at least this amount of time to auto trigger crouch
